code: "use strict";import*as React from'react';import Keyboard from"react-native-web/dist/exports/Keyboard";import TextInput from"react-native-web/dist/exports/TextInput";export function useKeyboardManager(isEnabled){const previouslyFocusedTextInputRef=React.useRef(undefined);const startTimestampRef=React.useRef(0);const keyboardTimeoutRef=React.useRef();const clearKeyboardTimeout=React.useCallback(()=>{if(keyboardTimeoutRef.current!==undefined){clearTimeout(keyboardTimeoutRef.current);keyboardTimeoutRef.current=undefined;}},[]);const onPageChangeStart=React.useCallback(()=>{if(!isEnabled()){return;}clearKeyboardTimeout();const input=TextInput.State.currentlyFocusedInput();input?.blur();previouslyFocusedTextInputRef.current=input;startTimestampRef.current=Date.now();},[clearKeyboardTimeout,isEnabled]);const onPageChangeConfirm=React.useCallback(force=>{if(!isEnabled()){return;}clearKeyboardTimeout();if(force){Keyboard.dismiss();}else{const input=previouslyFocusedTextInputRef.current;input?.blur();}previouslyFocusedTextInputRef.current=undefined;},[clearKeyboardTimeout,isEnabled]);const onPageChangeCancel=React.useCallback(()=>{if(!isEnabled()){return;}clearKeyboardTimeout();const input=previouslyFocusedTextInputRef.current;if(input){if(Date.now()-startTimestampRef.current<100){keyboardTimeoutRef.current=setTimeout(()=>{input?.focus();previouslyFocusedTextInputRef.current=undefined;},100);}else{input?.focus();previouslyFocusedTextInputRef.current=undefined;}}},[clearKeyboardTimeout,isEnabled]);React.useEffect(()=>{return()=>clearKeyboardTimeout();},[clearKeyboardTimeout]);return{onPageChangeStart,onPageChangeConfirm,onPageChangeCancel};}
